
	For development!
	DEBUG_ON 	= browser console debug enabled! 


	For production!
	DEBUG_OFF 	= browser console debug disabled! 


	Copy/paste the CSS and JS to your project assets/
	

	RTL = Left To Right (arabic direction)


	+++ +++ +++
	GULP NOTE

	To change dist folder destination and/or debug mode, edit: 
	gulp.config.settings.js
	+++ +++ +++
